<MethodEndpoint
  method={"get"}
  path={"/payment-methods/bank-accounts/verification"}
  context={"endpoint"}
>
  
</MethodEndpoint>



    Get URL to initiate the bank account verification process for the Account.

    ### Permissions
    * `payment-method:capture`
    * `payment-method:write`
